title: Bipin Rawat, India’s Top Military Official, Dies in Helicopter Crash
sub_head: Thirteen people died in crash in southern state of Tamil Nadu, the country’s air force said
body:
NEW DELHI—India’s top military official, Bipin Rawat, died Wednesday in a helicopter crash in the southern state of Tamil Nadu, the country’s air force said.
Mr. Rawat, 63 years old, the country’s chief of defense staff, was traveling along with his wife, staff and security commandos in the Russian-made helicopter at the time of the crash.
